document.docAuthor: Magalhães, Célio, Wehrtmann, Ingo S., Lara, Luis Rólier & Mantelatto, Fernando L.
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of the freshwater crabs of Costa Rica, with a revision of the genus Ptychophallus Smalley, 1964 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae)

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 61–70 .
Ptychophallus uncinatus Campos & Lemaitre, 1999: 61
, left first gonopod, holotype, USNM 276164, caudo-mesial view; 62, same data, latero-cephalic view of distal part; 63, left first gonopod, holotype of
Ptychophallus barbillaensis Rodríguez & Hedström, 2000
, UCR-MZ 2351-01, caudo-mesial view.
Allacanthos pittieri (Rathbun, 1898)
: 64, right first gonopod, holotype, USNM 21243, caudo-mesial view; 65, left first gonopod, NHMW 4016, caudo-mesial view; 66, same data, lateral view; 67, same data, cephalic view of distal part; 68, same data, apical-cephalic view of distal part.
Allacanthos yawi Magalhães
, Lara & Wehrtmann, 2010: 69, left first gonopod, holotype, UCR-MZ 2774-01, caudo-mesial view; 70, same data, latero-cephalic view (cl, cephalic lobe; fas, field of apical spines; lb, lateral lobe; mp, marginal process; ss, subdistal field of spines; tl, trianguliform lobe). Scale bars = 1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined . COSTA RICA . Puntarenas Province, Pacific drainage:
1 male
(cw 17.8 , cl 11.5 ), NHMW 4016 , San Vito, tributary stream from Aguabuena River,
14 .II. 1975
, I. Poglayen-Neuwall leg.;
2 males
,

, UCR-MZ 2662 -01, San Vito,

, A. & G. Smalley, Kerstings & Campo leg.;
2 males
,

, INPA 1872 , same data;

82 ° 55.666 'W
,

,

, 4 young, UCR-MZ 3214 -01, San Vito, creek La Palma, finca Las Marias,

, UCR-MZ 3222 -01, Coto Brus, Las Cruces, Culvert stream,
24 .vi. 2011
, leg. unknown;
1 male
, INPA 2018 , same data;
1 male
, syntype , USNM 21243 , Agua Buena,
9 .iii. 1897
, H. Pittier leg.

PANAMA . Chiriquí Province, Pacific drainage:
1 male
, NHMW 4015 , Chiriquí, mouth of stream in the Los Venados creek (tributary of Chiriquí River), SE of Cañas Gordas,
12 .ii. 1975
, I. Poglayen-Neuwall leg.

Syntypes and type locality
. Two males and two females ( USNM 21243 ) according to
Rathbun ( 1898 )
.
Rodriguez ( 1982 )
mentioned two males and one female. The senior author found only one male, cw 18.9 , cl 12.1 , which is partially dearticulated, carapace damaged and abdomen detached from the body. Costa Rica , Puntarenas Province, Agua Buena (Pacific drainage).

Remarks . See
Magalhães et al. ( 2010 )
for a discussion of the affinities with
A. yawi
.
